sections.heading: Adverb Forms Overview
sections.content:
Japanese adjectives can become adverbs to modify verbs. The formation differs for i-adjectives and na-adjectives.

I-adjective: 速い → 速く (quickly) Na-adjective: 静か → 静かに (quietly)

children.heading: Formation
children.content:
Change い to く

速い (hayai) → 速く (hayaku) - quickly, fast 高い (takai) → 高く (takaku) - highly, expensively 美しい (utsukushii) → 美しく (utsukushiku) - beautifully 大きい (ookii) → 大きく (ookiku) - greatly, largely

children.heading: Common I-adjective Adverbs
children.content: 早い → 早く (hayaku) - early 遅い → 遅く (osoku) - late 近い → 近く (chikaku) - nearby, closely 遠い → 遠く (tooku) - far 強い → 強く (tsuyoku) - strongly 弱い → 弱く (yowaku) - weakly 多い → 多く (ooku) - many, much 少ない → 少なく (sukunaku) - few, little

children.heading: Formation
children.content:
Add に to the na-adjective

静か (shizuka) → 静かに (shizuka ni) - quietly きれい (kirei) → きれいに (kirei ni) - beautifully, cleanly 丁寧 (teinei) → 丁寧に (teinei ni) - politely, carefully 真面目 (majime) → 真面目に (majime ni) - seriously 簡単 (kantan) → 簡単に (kantan ni) - simply, easily

children.heading: Common Na-adjective Adverbs
children.content: 上手 → 上手に (jouzu ni) - skillfully 下手 → 下手に (heta ni) - poorly, unskillfully 親切 → 親切に (shinsetsu ni) - kindly 元気 → 元気に (genki ni) - energetically, vigorously 便利 → 便利に (benri ni) - conveniently 安全 → 安全に (anzen ni) - safely

children.heading: Modifying Verbs
children.content: 速く走る "run fast" 静かに話す "speak quietly" きれいに書く "write neatly" 丁寧に説明する "explain politely/carefully"

children.heading: Modifying Entire Sentences
children.content: 早く帰ります "I'll go home early" 大きく育つ "grow big/greatly" 真面目に勉強する "study seriously"

sections.heading: Special Case: いい/よい
sections.content: いい / よい → よく (well) よく分かる "understand well" よく寝る "sleep well" よく食べる "eat well"

children.heading: Speed/Manner
children.content: 速く (hayaku) - fast, quickly 遅く (osoku) - slowly, late ゆっくり (yukkuri) - slowly, leisurely 急いで (isoide) - hurriedly

children.heading: Degree
children.content: 高く (takaku) - highly 低く (hikuku) - lowly 大きく (ookiku) - greatly 小さく (chiisaku) - slightly 多く (ooku) - much, many 少なく (sukunaku) - few, little

children.heading: Quality
children.content: 美しく (utsukushiku) - beautifully きれいに (kirei ni) - beautifully, cleanly 上手に (jouzu ni) - skillfully 下手に (heta ni) - poorly

children.heading: Manner
children.content: 静かに (shizuka ni) - quietly にぎやかに (nigiyaka ni) - lively 丁寧に (teinei ni) - politely, carefully 親切に (shinsetsu ni) - kindly

children.heading: Example 1: Instructions
children.content: A: どう書けばいいですか？ "How should I write it?" B: もっと大きく書いてください "Please write it bigger" A: こうですか？ "Like this?" B: はい、そしてきれいに書いてください "Yes, and please write it neatly"

children.heading: Example 2: Daily Actions
children.content: A: 今朝早く起きた？ "Did you wake up early this morning?" B: うん、6時に起きた "Yeah, I woke up at 6" A: すごい！ "Amazing!" B: でも、ゆっくり朝ご飯を食べた "But I ate breakfast slowly"

children.heading: Example 3: Requests
children.content: A: ちょっと静かに話してください "Please speak a little quietly" B: すみません "Sorry" A: あと、もっとゆっくり話してください "Also, please speak more slowly" B: 分かりました "Understood"

sections.heading: Using with する (to do/make)
sections.content:
Many adverbs work with する:

大きくする - make big, enlarge 小さくする - make small, reduce きれいにする - make clean, tidy up 静かにする - make quiet, be quiet 元気にする - cheer up, invigorate

children.heading: Examples
children.content: 部屋をきれいにする "clean/tidy up the room" 音を小さくしてください "Please turn down the volume" みんなを元気にする "cheer everyone up"

sections.heading: Using with なる (to become)
sections.content:
Adverbs work with なる to express change:

大きくなる - become big, grow 小さくなる - become small, shrink きれいになる - become clean/beautiful 静かになる - become quiet 元気になる - become healthy/energetic

children.heading: Examples
children.content: 子供が大きくなった "The child grew up" 部屋がきれいになりました "The room became clean" 病気が治って元気になった "I recovered from illness and became healthy"

sections.heading: Comparing Adjectives and Adverbs
sections.content: | Adjective | Adverb | Usage | | ---------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------ | | 速い車 | 速く走る | fast car / run fast | | 高い山 | 高く飛ぶ | tall mountain / fly high | | 静かな部屋 | 静かに話す | quiet room / speak quietly | | きれいな花 | きれいに咲く | beautiful flower / bloom beautifully |

children.heading: Side by Side
children.content: Adjective modifying noun: 速い車 "fast car" 静かな部屋 "quiet room" Adverb modifying verb: 速く走る "run fast" 静かに話す "speak quietly"

children.heading: Daily Activities
children.content: 早く起きる - wake up early 遅く寝る - sleep late よく食べる - eat well ゆっくり歩く - walk slowly 速く走る - run fast

children.heading: Speaking/Communication
children.content: 静かに話す - speak quietly 大きく話す - speak loudly ゆっくり話す - speak slowly 丁寧に説明する - explain politely 親切に教える - teach kindly

children.heading: Writing/Creating
children.content: きれいに書く - write neatly 大きく書く - write big 小さく書く - write small 美しく描く - draw beautifully

children.heading: もっと (more)
children.content: もっと速く走って "Run faster" もっと静かにしてください "Please be quieter" もっときれいに書いて "Write more neatly"

children.heading: とても / すごく (very)
children.content: とても速く走る "run very fast" すごく静かに話す "speak very quietly"

children.heading: あまり～ない (not very)
children.content: あまり速く走らない "don't run very fast" あまり大きく書かない "don't write very big"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Using Adjective Instead of Adverb
children.content: Wrong: 速い走る ❌ Right: 速く走る ✓ "run fast" Wrong: 静かな話す ❌ Right: 静かに話す ✓ "speak quietly"

children.heading: Mistake 2: Wrong Adverb Form
children.content: Wrong: 静かく話す ❌ Right: 静かに話す ✓ Wrong: きれいく書く ❌ Right: きれいに書く ✓

children.heading: Mistake 3: Using に with I-adjectives
children.content: Wrong: 速いに走る ❌ Right: 速く走る ✓ Wrong: 大きいに書く ❌ Right: 大きく書く ✓

children.heading: Mistake 4: Using く with Na-adjectives
children.content: Wrong: 静かく話す ❌ Right: 静かに話す ✓ Wrong: きれいく書く ❌ Right: きれいに書く ✓

sections.heading: Multiple Adverbs
sections.content: 早く静かに起きる "wake up early and quietly" きれいに丁寧に書く "write neatly and carefully" ゆっくり大きく話す "speak slowly and loudly"

children.heading: I-adjectives
children.content: 高く → 高くなく (not highly) 速く → 速くなく (not fast) 高くなく飛ぶ "fly not high" 速くなく走る "run not fast"

children.heading: Na-adjectives
children.content: 静かに → 静かにせず / 静かでなく きれいに → きれいにせず / きれいでなく

children.heading: よく (well, often)
children.content: よく分かる "understand well" よく来る "come often" よく寝る "sleep well"

children.heading: 早く (early, quickly)
children.content: 早く来て "Come quickly" 早く帰る "go home early"

children.heading: 遠く (far)
children.content: 遠くから来る "come from far away" 遠くに見える "can see far away"

children.heading: Transformation Practice
children.content: 速い → 速く → 速く走る 高い → 高く → 高く飛ぶ 美しい → 美しく → 美しく咲く 静か → 静かに → 静かに話す きれい → きれいに → きれいに書く 丁寧 → 丁寧に → 丁寧に説明する

children.heading: Commands
children.content: もっと大きく書いて "Write bigger" 静かにしてください "Please be quiet" ゆっくり話してください "Please speak slowly"

children.heading: Descriptions
children.content: 彼は速く走る "He runs fast" 彼女はきれいに歌う "She sings beautifully" 先生は丁寧に教える "The teacher teaches carefully"

children.heading: Changes
children.content: だんだん大きくなる "gradually become big" 急に静かになった "suddenly became quiet" 少しずつきれいになる "gradually become clean/beautiful"

sections.heading: Key Takeaways
sections.content:
✓ I-adjectives: い → く ✓ Na-adjectives: add に ✓ いい → よく (irregular) ✓ Modify verbs, not nouns ✓ Work with する/なる ✓ Can be negated ✓ Stack multiple adverbs ✓ Essential for natural expression

Master adverb forms - make your Japanese more dynamic!
